channel.title: Footbag WorldWide
channel.description: The world of footbag at your fingertips. Visit footbag.org to find footbag clubs, players, information, rules, and more. Become a part of the global community of novice, intermediate, and advanced footbag players through this site hosted by the International Footbag Players' Association, Inc. (A U.S. 501(c)(3) non-profit corporation.).
channel.copyright: XML Output Copyright 2006 IFPA, Inc. All rights reserved.

description.p:
It’s been a while since we last hosted an event, but the time has finally come again. FC Footstar welcomes you all to Berlin for the German Footbag Open 2026!
The event will take place on the weekend of February 7-8 in the
familiar gym at Palisadenstrasse 76-78.
There will be competition in Net, as well as a Freestyle Jam. If there’s enough interest, we might have some
Freestyle competition as well. And then there’s 2-Square, above all.
Please register here:
https://fcfootstar.de/cms/gfo2026/
description.pre:
Schedule
Friday, Feb 6th 21.00h Welcome Party at Kaschk (Linienstraﬂe 40, 10119 Berlin)
Saturday, Feb 7th 10.00h Players Meeting 10.30h Open Doubles Net 13.00h Lunch 13.30h Mixed Doubles Net 18.00h Net Finals Party t.b.a.
Sunday, Nov 8th 10.00 Players Meeting (Singles Net) 10.30h Singles Net 12.00h Americano Doubles Net 14.30h 2-Square 16.00h Singles Final 18.00h Award Ceremony
Shreds on both days, Freestyle competition t.b.a

item.title: Upcoming Event: San Francisco Net Jam
